summary: The sprint planning meeting concluded with the client approving the start of execution for Sprint SP-001, which was saved and initiated to generate code for authentication and Supabase integration.

decisions.title: Initiate Sprint SP-001 Execution
decisions.details: Sprint plan saved, execution started, and AI team assigned to work on stories including auth and Supabase code generation.

sign_offs.what: Approved start of execution for Sprint SP-001

actions.task: Begin working on the stories for Sprint SP-001
